title: A teenager has been shot in Berkeley County.
content:
HEDGESVILLE, WV.
A teenager has been accidently shot in Berkeley County.
Berkeley County Emergency Dispatchers say around 5 pm, a 15-year old person was shot in the face on Dunham Drive, near Back Creek Valley Road in Hedgesville, WV.
The teenager was flown out to Fairfax Hospital. The condition is unknown. The Berkeley County Sheriff's Office is investigating. We will have more information once it's available.
